import React from 'react' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' function AddUser() { const [user,setUser] = useState({ name:"", username:"", email:"" }) const {name,username,email} = user const onInputChange=(e) =>{ setUser({...user,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } cons return (
